mapper.select: select * from schedule_table where schedule_date = #{schedule_date} and user_id = #{user_id} order by schedule_time

select DAYOFMONTH(schedule_date) as schedule_day, count(*) as schedule_count from schedule_table where (schedule_date between #{schedule_date} and LAST_DAY(#{schedule_date})) and user_id = #{user_id} group by schedule_day order by schedule_day
mapper.insert: insert into schedule_table(user_id,schedule_date,schedule_time,schedule_content, schedule_checked, schedule_reg_date, schedule_mod_date) values(#{user_id},#{schedule_date},#{schedule_time},#{schedule_content}, 0, now(), now())
